title: singler
description:
SingleR performs reference-based cell type annotation for single-cell RNA-seq data 
by computing Spearman correlations between test cells and reference samples with known labels, 
using marker genes to assign the most similar cell type label to each new cell.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: The input (query) data to be labeled

input_layer.description: The layer in the input data containing log normalized counts to be used for cell type annotation if .X is not to be used.

input_var_gene_names.description: The name of the adata .var column in the input data containing gene names; when no gene_name_layer is provided, the var index will be used.

input_obs_clusters.description: The name of the adata .obs column containing cluster identities of the observations

input_reference_gene_overlap.description: The minimum number of genes present in both the reference and query datasets.

output_obs_predictions.description: In which `.obs` slot to store the predicted labels

output_obs_probability.description: In which `.obs` slots to store the probability of the predicted labels.

output_obs_delta_next.description: In which `.obs` slot to store the delta between the best and next-best score

output_obs_pruned_predictions.description: In which `.obs` slot to store the pruned labels, where low-quality labels are replaced with NA's

output_obsm_scores.description: In which `.obsm` slot to store the matrix of prediction correlations at the specified quantile for each label (column) in each cell (row).

output_compression.description:
Compression format to use for the output AnnData and/or Mudata objects.
By default no compression is applied.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: Arguments related to the training of and classification with the SingleR model

de_n_genes.description:
The number of differentially expressed genes across labels to be calculated from the reference.
Defaults to 500 * (2/3) ^ log2(N) where N is the number of unique labels when if `--de_method` is set to `classic`,
otherwise, defaults to 10.

de_method.description: Method to detect differentially expressed genes between pairs of labels.

quantile.description: The quantile of the correlation distribution to use to compute the score per label.

fine_tune.description: Whether finetuning should be performed to improve the resolution

fine_tuning_threshold.description: The maximum difference from the maximum correlation to use in fine-tuning

prune.description: Whether label pruning should be performed

sanitize_ensembl_ids.description: Whether to sanitize ensembl ids by removing version numbers.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Arguments related to the reference dataset.
The reference data to train the CellTypist classifiers on

reference_layer.description: The layer in the reference data containing lognormalized couns to be used for cell type annotation if .X is not to be used

reference_obs_target.description: The name of the adata obs column in the reference data containing cell type annotations.

reference_var_gene_names.description: The name of the adata var column in the reference data containing gene names; when no gene_name_layer is provided, the var index will be used.

reference_var_input.description: .var column containing a boolean mask corresponding to genes to be used for marker selection

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
